dct_title_s: Gall & Inglis' map of Syria antiqua et Palæstina
dct_alternative_sm: Gall & Inglis' map of Syria antiqua et Palaestina
dct_description_sm: Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
2 bar scales on map given in "British miles" and "Roman miles".
Includes index: Reference to the tribes.
Shows topography, drainage, territorial boundaries of the tribes of Israel, travel routes, places of historical interest.
